ModMetaData.name: OHU Shipyard - Rimsenal Edition
ModMetaData.author: SpaceDorf,pickbullmister
ModMetaData.description:
Death from Above - Now in Stores at your favorite Rimsenal Faction.
Greydale Defense : Cheetah - Close Airsupport. : Smilodon - Mobile Headquarter. Your Fortress away from Home.(planned)
Yunhwa Precission : Wyvern - Air Superiority
Tisphone Enterprise : Zephyr - Troop Transport
SpaceDorf : Code, Sketches, dorfing around. pickbullmister : Art, actual knowledge about aviation.
Credits Cpt.Ohu for creating the awesome Dropship Mod rooki1 for creating the equally awesome Rimsenal Kaptain_Kavern, Walking_Problem and ChickenPlucker for keeping me motivated.
The rest of the Rimworld (Mod) Community for being awesome and inspirational.
and Howard Taylor for the 70 Maxims of Maximally Effective Mercenaries
v0.000.05
included GD Cheetah, TE Zephyr and YP Wyvern.
